description:
The team event finals begin. Their opponent is Saitama Futaba. Yusa and Yokokawa and the twins` doubles matches as well as Ryo`s singles match begin simultaneously. Meanwhile, at school Isshiki and the other students are livestreaming the matches, and the twins` mother and Ryo`s parents come to cheer them on. Hongo is also there on the other side of the screen watching with great intensity. With their hopes on their backs, the team is determined to make this the year they become national champions as they head into their final battle!!
Source: crunchyroll
